meanings.definition: A firearm typically used for hunting or sport shooting.
meanings.sent1: Dad took his shotgun to go hunting.
meanings.sent2: The hunter aimed his shotgun at the target.
meanings.sent3: The shotgun was excited to go hunting with Dad.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a shotgun, spreading joy everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The shotgun roared, echoing through the forest.

meanings.definition: A front passenger seat in a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: I prefer sitting in the shotgun when we drive.
meanings.sent2: She called dibs on the shotgun for the road trip.
meanings.sent3: The shotgun felt important being in the front seat.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a shotgun, lighting up the car.
meanings.sent5: The view from the shotgun was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: To ride in the front passenger seat of a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: I shotgunned the ride to the mall with my friends.
meanings.sent2: She always shotgunned the best seat in the car.
meanings.sent3: He shotgunned his way to the front, eager for the view.
meanings.sent4: Their laughter shotgunned through the car, infectious and loud.
meanings.sent5: I shotgunned my way to the front, feeling the wind in my hair.
